v0 is for the basic tictactoe game.

----
|| *Path* || *Method*||
||/games || GET ||

*Request Parameters*<br/>
_Required:_
none

_Optional:_
none

*Response*
Returns the list of games played

_Sample_

<table border="1"><tr><td><pre>
[{
    "id": "305710",
    "href": "http://localhost:3007/rest/games/305710"
}, {
    "id": "150103",
    "href": "http://localhost:3007/rest/games/150103"
}, {
    "id": "555211",
    "href": "http://localhost:3007/rest/games/555211"
}]
</pre></td></tr></table>

----
|| *Path* || *Method*||
||/games/XXXXXX || GET ||

*Request Parameters*<br/>
_Required:_
XXXXXX = this is the id of the game

_Optional:_
- playersMove<br/>
Example: to find which player has the next move for game 59599. 
|| 'http://localhost:3007/rest/games/59599?playersMove' ||
- gameStatus<br/>
Example: to find which player has won game 59599 (or if it is in progress, or a 'cat'). 
|| 'http://localhost:3007/rest/games/59599?playersMove' ||

*Response*
Returns the details of the game specified by XXXXXX 
<table border="1"><tr><td><pre>
{"game":
   {
     "id":"305710",
     "playersMove": "X",
     "gameStatus": "In Progress",
     "validMoves": ["center","upper-left","center-right"],
     "currentBoard": [
       {
       "upper-left":"",
       "top-center":"X",
       "upper-right":"O",
       "center-left":"X",
       "center": "",
       "center-right": "",
       "lower-left": "O",
       "bottom-center": "X",
       "lower-right": "O"
     ]
   }
}
</pre></td></tr></table>

----
|| *Path* || *Method*||
||/games/XXXXXX/moves/XX || POST ||

*Request Parameters*
_Required:_
XX: this is the move number being set
player: Specify the mark of the player taking their turn
move: Specify the location of the move
Example:<br/>
|| 'http://localhost:3007/rest/games/090210/moves/4?player="O"&move="top-center"' ||

_Optional:_
none
*Response*
TBD
